verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Jesus, Jesus, dearest Lord! Forgive me if I say, For very love, Thy sacred name A thousand times a day.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Burn, burn, O love, within my heart, Burn fiercely night and day, Till all the dross of earthly loves Is burned, and burned away.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What limit is there to this love? Thy flight, where wilt Thou stay? On, on! our Lord is sweeter far Today than yesterday.{/lang-eng}
